snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA U1692 : SNORA70 SNORA70B SNORA70C SNORA70D SNORA70E SNORA70F SNORA70G (20100624末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。 (20111201吉浜)ホスト遺伝子の塩基配列と構造をRPGを参考に変更しました。
snoopy.evidence: Ganot, P., Bortolin, M. L., and Kiss, T. (1997a). Site-specific pseudouridine formation in preribosomal RNA is guided by small nucleolar RNAs. Cell 89, 799-809, Ganot, P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1997b). The family of box ACA small nucleolar RNAs is defined by an evolutionarily conserved secondary structure and ubiquitous sequence elements essential for RNA accumulation. Genes Dev 11, 941-956, Weber MJ. (2006) Mammalian Small Nucleolar RNAs Are Mobile Genetic Elements. PLoS Genet. 2(12):e205, Luo Y. and Li S. (2007) Genome-wide analyses of retrogenes derived from the human box H/ACA snoRNAs. Nuc. Acids Res. 35(2):559-71.
